recipes.title: Sambar (South Indian Lentil Curry)
recipes.description: A flavorful South Indian curry made with lentils, tamarind, and mixed vegetables.
instructions: Pressure cook dal until soft and mash it well.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Add onion and tomato; sauté till soft.
Add vegetables and sambar powder; cook till tender.
Add tamarind juice and mashed dal; mix well.
Simmer for 10 minutes and garnish with coriander leaves.

recipes.title: Idli with Pudina-chutney
recipes.description: Soft, fluffy South Indian breakfast made with fermented rice and urad dal batter.
instructions: Soak rice and dal separately for 4–6 hours.
Grind them to a smooth batter; mix and ferment overnight.
Add salt, mix well and pour into idli molds.
Steam for 10 minutes and serve with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Dosa (Crispy Rice Crepe)
recipes.description: A thin, crispy crepe made from fermented rice and urad dal batter.
instructions: Soak rice, dal, and fenugreek seeds for 6 hours.
Grind and ferment overnight.
Add salt and mix well.
Spread batter thinly on a hot tawa; drizzle oil and cook till crisp.

recipes.title: Pongal (Ven Pongal)
recipes.description: A comforting South Indian dish made with rice, moong dal, ghee, and black pepper.
instructions: Dry roast moong dal till golden.
Cook rice and dal together till soft.
Heat ghee, fry cashews, pepper, and cumin.
Add to cooked rice-dal mixture and mix well.

recipes.title: Chicken Chettinad
recipes.description: A spicy and aromatic chicken curry from the Chettinad region of Tamil Nadu.
instructions: Heat oil, add onions and curry leaves, sauté till golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes; cook till soft.
Add Chettinad masala and chicken pieces.
Cook until chicken is done and masala thickens.

recipes.title: Curd Rice (Thayir Sadam)
recipes.description: A cooling South Indian dish made by mixing rice with curd and tempering.
instructions: Mash the rice and mix with curd and salt.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds, chili, and curry leaves.
Pour tempering over the curd rice and mix well.
Garnish with grated carrot and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Prawn Masala
recipes.description: A spicy seafood curry made with fresh prawns and South Indian spices.
instructions: Heat oil, add onions and sauté till golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes; cook till soft.
Add spices and cleaned prawns.
Cook till prawns turn pink and masala thickens.

recipes.title: Rasam
recipes.description: A tangy South Indian soup made with tamarind, tomato, and pepper.
instructions: Boil tamarind juice with tomato and rasam powder.
Add salt and simmer for 10 minutes.
Prepare tempering with mustard, cumin, and curry leaves.
Pour over rasam and serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.description: A flavorful rice dish cooked with vegetables, spices, and herbs.
instructions: Sauté onion and tomato in ghee.
Add vegetables and biryani masala; cook for few minutes.
Add soaked rice and water; cook till rice is done.
Garnish with mint and coriander.

recipes.title: Parotta with Salna
recipes.description: Flaky layered flatbread served with spicy salna (gravy).
ingredients: For salna: onion, tomato, spices, and coconut paste
instructions: Knead dough with flour, salt, and oil. Rest for 30 mins.
Roll and fold to form layers, then cook on tawa with oil.
For salna, sauté onion, tomato, and spices; grind coconut paste and add.
Cook till gravy thickens and serve with parotta.
